name: Circle Pong (itch)
description:
Circle Pong is a circular arcade game, made in 3 days with Unity for Lowrezjam.

Built in GameJolt API Scoreboards.

Controls:

  • Left and Right or A and D to move.
  • X or Space To interact and Launch ball.
  • R to restart.
  • Esc to go back to main menu

Gamemodes:

  • Singleplayer
    • Collect "coins"
    • Time
    • Block Breaker
  • Multiplayer
    • Versus
    • Collect "coins"
    • Time
    • Block Breaker

Pixel perfect UI

If The gamejolt Api doesn't work you can play it on GameJolt here: http://gamejolt.com/games/circle-pong/139991
